channel.title: i cant enter the game
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "i cant enter the game" - login problem

item.title: Re: i cant enter the game
item.content:encoded: Then it gets Deleted, I kicked your Alt from my village do to Idling.

item.title: Re: i cant enter the game
item.content:encoded: WHat happens if my charater idles out because of this?

item.title: Re: i cant enter THE GAME
Re: i cant enter the game
item.content:encoded: This problem is already being addressed on the main billy forum. The topic has been discussed thoroughly and Im positive that McM will get around to it when he has time to. He has already fixed about a 100 bugs today and i dont blame him if he decides to just call it a night and get to it in the morning. So yes, this problem is happening to everybody and no one else can log in. It is not just you. Trying 50 more times to log in will not make you log in any easier it is just wasting your time and you are getting nothing done. There is no need to continue discussing this topic. Billy is down, end of discussion. Just wait for McM to fix it. Thank you.

item.title: Re: i cant enter the game
item.content:encoded: All right, everyone take a deep breath and calm down. Everyone is experiencing this problem right now. It says people are logged in, but if you look after you try to log in it will show your name as well so really nobody can get on. This is likely due to a mix up in the code being displayed in the picture and what the server thinks it should be. McMasters(game creator) has already spent the majority of the afternoon fixing bugs so he likely is getting shitfaced right now to drown away the pain. Be patient, he will probably fix it once he gets home/wakes up/finishes doing whatever he's doing right now.

item.title: Re: i cant enter the game
item.content:encoded: … it would appear the server admin for that game needs to get their head outta their ass and toss that frigging code confirmation crap… checked the Online Players list… how the hell can I be on when it isn't even letting me log in? Tell me that.

item.title: Re: i cant enter the game
item.content:encoded: Well shit, seems I'm not the only one with this issue, neh? I sat here for 10 minutes typing in them fucking codes and nothin' doin', keeps saying I need to enter the correct code… for chrissakes I'm getting repeats!

item.title: Re: i cant enter the game
item.content:encoded: I'm out too - same reason. What gives?

item.title: Re: i cant enter the game
item.content:encoded:
Is this everyone because it says that people are online in the game (I too am encountering this problem)

If I look at the list of people who are in-game, my character is listed as in-game even though I cannot log in because it keeps saying my code is wrong! I hope this is fixed soon!

item.title: Re: i cant enter the game
Re: i cant enter the game
item.content:encoded: I can't get in either, was able to this morning but not now. Also tells me my 4 letter code is wrong no matter how I enter in (lowercase, uppercase, etc). I guess other people are having problems with this too.

item.title: Re: i cant enter the game
item.content:encoded: Same here. It will not let me on the game. It keeps telling me that my 4 letter code is wrong. I have tried caps, no caps, and all 3 of my characters. Any help would be nice. I personally find the 4 letter code very annoying anyway.

item.title: i cant enter the game
item.content:encoded:
the game down at 9Am - 2Pm billy time.
i not know what time it is now, but, i cant login. it always said something wrong.
can u help me.
tq
D0NC35 - MURDER VILLAGE
